title: A Simple Way to Loop YouTube Videos on Android and iOS (No Apps) - Mrinal Saha
description: Here is a simple way to loop YouTube video on mobile devices like Android, iPhone and iPad etc without using any video loop app.  Though, to loop YouTube video on iPhone and iPad, you'll have to use a youtube loop mobile like listen on repeat. Unfortunately, there is no other way around it.   I use music from YouTube audio library  Cut Trance - Cephelopod by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution licence ( Source:  Artist:     You can reach me here   Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -
